choices.text:
Below is an instruction that describes a task. Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

### Instruction:
For libreoffice calc write an expression to copy contents from another cell and remove all single quotes

### Response:

To remove all single quotes from copied text in LibreOffice Calc, you can use the following formula: 

=SUBSTITUTE(A1,"'","")

Replace "A1" with the cell reference containing the copied text. This will replace all occurring single quotes with an empty string, removing them from the text.
